name: Where is bubble?
description:
Where is Bubble? Chapter 1

3D on-rails shotter, puzzles . Designed for Gdevelop Game Jam 3!

Play in full Screen!

https://liluo.io/maraino_jara_henao/where-is-bubble

Separation? 

Of course, the story is about a boy who loses his dog, on the way he will break monsters, objects anyway...

How to play?

Just use mouse to play ( left button shoot, right button reload). 

Fully functional on smartphones!

News:

After the  GameJam I will improve my writing in English, my native language is Spanish :)! 

Offtopic:  

Some images and inspiration come from my short film "The valley of dreams"
